node.html:
• Develop and maintain web solutions using HubSpot, JavaScript and CSS, ensuring seamless integration and exceptional user experiences.
  • Collaborate closely with international teams to deliver high-quality projects on time and within budget.
  • Implement best practices and modern technologies to optimize website performance and enhance overall functionality.

  • Utilized a variety of languages, platforms, and frameworks, including HubSpot, Javascript, and CSS, to create impactful digital experiences.
  • Collaborated daily with cross-functional teams of designers, engineers, business analysts to ensure successful project delivery and client satisfaction.

• During my years as a web developer I have worked on multiple projects

  • Work with multi-disciplinary teams of engineers, designers, medical staff and clients on a daily basis
